experience: It's good jacket to starts with. It's not light weight if this is your first riding protection jacket but you will get used to it later. Airy mesh and it helped to cool down. Easy to wash and store.
cons: Not lightweight (especially as a first protection jacket)
Takes time to get used to
title: Rynox Air GT 4 Jacket
description: The Rynox AIR GT 4 Jacket is designed for both daily commutes and weekend adventures. It offers comprehensive CE-certified impact protection from Cerros, including asymmetric shoulder protectors. The jacket features a DWR (Durable Water Repellent) coated shell for water and abrasion resistance and is compatible with the MODULAYER system for adding rain or winter liners. Additional features include increased visibility through reflective panels and an adjustable fit for comfort.
